price: Na unapo soma Qur'ani tunaweka baina yako na wale wasio iamini Akhera pazia linalo wafunika.
arabic: وَإِذَا قَرَأۡتَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ جَعَلۡنَا بَيۡنَكَ وَبَيۡنَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ حِجَابٗا مَّسۡتُورٗا
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Unapo soma Qur'ani inayo taja dalili za Haki, Sisi huweka pazia, lenye kukuficha baina yako na wale wasio amini kufufuliwa na malipo, pale wanapo taka kukushambulia. Kwa hivyo hawakuoni.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qarata al-qur'āna jaʿalnā baynaka wabayna alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati ḥijāban mastūran
